src/hooks/useWorkoutHistory.js.description: Custom hook for workout history localStorage management. Uses STORAGE_KEY='workout_history', stores array of entries with { id, date, workoutName, duration, weekKey?, day? }. Provides history, addWorkout, deleteWorkout, clearHistory. Entries sorted newest first.

src/components/ConfirmDialog.jsx.description: Reusable confirmation dialog component for destructive actions. Props: isOpen, title, message, confirmText, cancelText, onConfirm, onCancel, variant (danger/warning). Uses modal overlay pattern with animate-fade-in/slide-up, click-outside-to-dismiss, and btn-danger/btn-accent styling based on variant.

src/components/HistoryView.jsx.description: HistoryView component displays workout history in a modal overlay. Props: isOpen, history, onClose, onDelete, onClearAll. Features: table-style display with glass-card rows, date/workout name/duration columns, empty state message, delete per entry with confirmation, Clear All with confirmation. Uses ConfirmDialog for destructive actions and formatTime from linearizer.js for duration formatting.
